Docs.summary: Contains classes you can use to override the life-cycle stages of a mobile control to modify its default XHTML markup or behavior for new markup standards or for specific browsers and mobile devices. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter> is inherited by all adapter classes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters> namespace, including <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlLabelAdapter> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlSelectionListAdapter>.
